answers.answer: I ended up with high blood pressure with my daughter. I ate crazy amounts of sugar. Did your Dr tell you anything
Im having a daughter as well. And with my nausea she doesn't really let me eat alot of sugary things. Tomorrow ill do my glucose test so well see.  But ive never had high blood pressure

I had high blood pressure with both my first boys. I had to avoid salty foods and wasn't allowed to drive and restricted activities. Ended up having to have inductions with both about a week and a half early. I was lucky my pressures dropped back to normal the second my water broke both times. Try to relax as much as possible.

I had it also with my son who is 4,now. I'm pregnant with my second only 9 weeks. But they r already checking me for protein in urine. Most of the time if u have too much protein in urine u probably have preeclampsia. It can be scary but the drs will know exactly what to do. I was put on bed rest at 25 weeks with my son and didn't listen too good and ended up living in the hospital from 28 weeks til 37 weeks so if they say bed rest od listen. But I wouldn't worry too much just listen to drs.:)

question: Has anyone had this? I hope im not the only one. .
title: High Blood Pressure,  Too Much Protein in Urine
